title: Labelling/filtering of lawfully acquired biometric datasets (Art. 5(1)(g) carve-out)

question.prompt: Is it merely labelling or filtering of lawfully acquired biometric datasets (e.g., images) based on biometric data?

items.label: Recital (30)
items.text: Recital clarifies that lawful labelling/filtering of biometric datasets (e.g., sorting by eye/hair colour) is not covered by the prohibition.
